data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lumbsch, H. Thorsten, Kantvilas, Gintaras, Parnmen, Sittiporn (2012): Molecular data support placement of Cameronia in Ostropomycetidae (Lecanoromycetes, Ascomycota). PhytoKeys 5: 31-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.5.4140, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.5.4140
